definition: accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 知識改變命運，英文成就未來。
科託娃是註定成就卓越的。

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，極樂國土，成就如是功德莊嚴。

sentences.english: He does exceedingly abundantly above and beyond what we could ever ask, imagine or think!
sentences.chinese: 神能充充足足的成就一切，超過我們所求所想的。

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《繡襦記》的藝術成就主要體現在兩方面。

sentences.english: At the awards ceremony, the "Lifetime Achievement Award" went to Fu Zhengyi.
sentences.chinese: 在頒獎典禮上，傅正義獲得“終生成就獎”。

sentences.english: Even non-school days, they would have little success.
sentences.chinese: 即便是天才不學，也不會有多大的成就。

sentences.english: This is just a small glimpse into some of his accolades as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 這些只是他作爲一名藝人，所獲成就的小小一瞥。

sentences.english: Here are some things to consider so that your days are loaded with accomplishments.
sentences.chinese: 爲了你的每一天都飽有成就，你需要考慮的以下幾點。

sentences.english: But if less is more, how you keepin' score?
sentences.chinese: 但如果少就是多，成就該如何算？

sentences.english: This achievement led to the establishment of what was to become the renowned Connecticut clock-making industry.
sentences.chinese: 這項成就爲康乃狄克州打造出名聲卓越的鐘表工業。

sentences.english: So, Langer applied for various jobs in education, but with very little success.
sentences.chinese: 所以蘭格申請了各種各樣的教育工作，但是成就有限。

sentences.english: Shanghai classical garden enjoys a long history and has achieved great accomplishment in gardening art.
sentences.chinese: 上海園林歷史悠久，在造園藝術上取得了很高成就。

sentences.english: Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
sentences.chinese: 沒一個偉大成就都是一顆激情燃燒的心所贏得的勝利。

sentences.english: He was jealous of nobody's achievements.
sentences.chinese: 他不嫉妒任何人的成就。

sentences.english: The renewal leads to a syncronistic dream accolade of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 重生，會帶來榮曜夢想成就的同步。

definition: variant of 收穫|收获[shou1 huo4]
undertaking/project/activity/(charitable, political or revolutionary) cause/publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation/career/occupation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
